variable.name: inact_tau_slow
variable.comment: time constant of slow inactivation gate

variable.name: inact_tau_fast
variable.comment: time constant of fast inactivation gate

variable.name: to.inact_total
variable.comment: total inactivation resulting from fast and slow inactivation gates

variable.name: to.inact_fast.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: to.inact_fast.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: to.inact_slow.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: to.act.n
variable.comment: ratio of molecules in open conformation

variable.name: l2.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: l2.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: l2.use_init
variable.comment: determines whether initial value for v is used

variable.name: to.inact_slow.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: to.inact_fast.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: to.inact_slow.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: to.act.tau
variable.comment: time constant for obtaining steady state (i.e. time until difference between n and steady has reduced by a factor of 1/e)

variable.name: to.act.steady
variable.comment: value that n would reach if v_gate was held constant

variable.name: to.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: to.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

variable.name: vc.stim.i
variable.comment: Current flowing from pin p to pin n

variable.name: vc.v_stim
variable.comment: input voltage (needs to be defined externally)

variable.name: vc.stim.v
variable.comment: Voltage between pin p and n (= p.v - n.v) as input signal

variable.name: vc.v
variable.comment: Voltage drop of the two pins (= p.v - n.v)

equations.equation:
vc.g.p.i + vc.i - vc.n.i = 0.0
vc.g.p.i
vc.i
vc.n.i
0.0

der(l2.v) = l2.i / l2.c
l2.v
l2.i
l2.c

der(to.act.n) = (act_steady - to.act.n) / act_tau
to.act.n
act_steady
to.act.n
act_tau

der(to.inact_slow.n) = (inact_steady - to.inact_slow.n) / inact_tau_slow
to.inact_slow.n
inact_steady
to.inact_slow.n
inact_tau_slow

der(to.inact_fast.n) = (to.inact_fast.steady - to.inact_fast.n) / inact_tau_fast
to.inact_fast.n
to.inact_fast.steady
to.inact_fast.n
inact_tau_fast

to.open_ratio = to.act.n * to.inact_total
to.open_ratio
to.act.n
to.inact_total

to.i_open = to.g_max * (l2.v - to.v_eq)
to.i_open
to.g_max
l2.v
to.v_eq

to.i_ion = to.open_ratio * to.i_open
to.i_ion
to.open_ratio
to.i_open

to.g = to.open_ratio * to.g_max
to.g
to.open_ratio
to.g_max

to.inact_total = 0.55 * to.inact_slow.n + 0.45 * to.inact_fast.n
to.inact_total
0.55
to.inact_slow.n
0.45
to.inact_fast.n

function.name: InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.TransientOutwardSteady.to.act.fsteady
InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.TransientOutwardSteady.to.act.ftau
InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.TransientOutwardSteady.to.ftau.falpha
InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.TransientOutwardSteady.to.ftau.fbeta

InaMo.Examples.ComponentTests.TransientOutwardSteady.to.inact_fast.ftau
